sentences.en: Arteriosclerosis affects an increasingly broad segment of the older population.
sentences.cn: 老年人中动脉硬化越来越多.

sentences.en: As they remove each segment, they analyze its molecular sequence.
sentences.cn: 在除去每一片段时, 他们分析了片段的分子顺序.

sentences.en: Each segment of DNA thus synthesized is called a replicon.
sentences.cn: 这样合成的每一片段DNA称为复制子.

sentences.en: Give me a segment of a tangerine to taste.
Most often this involved a segment of a girder web.
sentences.cn: 大多数出现在主渠腹板部分.
人口中的若干组成部分

sentences.en: She cleaned a small segment of the painting.
sentences.cn: 她擦干净了这幅画的一小部分。

sentences.en: The 11 th segment carries a pair of segmented appendages, the cerci.
sentences.cn: 第十一节有一对分节的附肢, 即尾须.

sentences.en: The churning debris reached a relatively straight - wall segment of the channel.
sentences.cn: 翻腾的岩屑到达相对顺直的河道壁的地段.

sentences.en: The company dominates this segment of the market.
sentences.cn: 这家公司控制着这一部分市场.

sentences.en: The region between two nodes is known as the internodal segment.
sentences.cn: 在两结间的部分称为结间段.

sentences.en: The transverse nerves pass to the spiracles of their segment.
sentences.cn: 横神经通往同体节的气门.

sentences.en: These unusual instances will be limited to a segment of the demand curve.
sentences.cn: 这些反常情况仅限于在需求曲线的某一部分上.

sentences.en: This page will explain how routers are used to segment a LAN .
sentences.cn: 这一页将解释路由器如何在区域网路分割区段。

sentences.en: Three-to-five day cruises are the fastest-growing segment of the market.
sentences.cn: 3至5天的乘船游览是该市场中发展最快的部分。

sentences.en: With straightedge and compasses, divide a segment of a into 2 parts.
sentences.cn: 用直尺和圆规把线段a分成两部分.

phrases.tran_cn: 代码段；程序段，程序码区段
细分市场；市场区隔；分块市场

trans.tran_cn: 部分，段落，环节，[计算机]（字符等的）分段，[动物学]节片
trans.tran_en: a part of something that is different from or affected differently from the whole in some way
to divide something into parts that are different from each other
